articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
Details will be unveiled in a live-streaming program on October 1 


Kato*Fuku, the legendary VA unit consisting of Emiri Kato (Aura Bella Fiore in Overlord) and Kaori Fukuhara (Tsukasa Hiiragi in Lucky Star), announced the resumption of their activities after 6 years! The unit was formed in 2012 and had been inactive since September 2016. Hit the jump for more details!
articles.title: Emiri Kato & Kaori Fukuhara's Legendary VA unit Kato*Fuku Resumes Activities after 6 Years

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
It's all set to begin with a public beta test


Arc System Works America made a welcome announcement for players of Guilty Gear Xrd REV 2 during CEOtaku 2022 over the weekend. Read on for more.
articles.title: Guilty Gear Xrd REV 2 Adds Rollback Netcode on October 28

articles.author: Humberto Saabedra
articles.description:
Manga and light novel series being adapted by Madhouse


Streaming service HIDIVE is continuing its Fall 2022 simulcast announcements by shifting gears from battle maids in Akihabara to the story of a princess that prefers books over royal duties in Bibliophile Princess. Read on for the details.
articles.title: Bibliophile Princess TV Anime Brings Romantic Drama To HIDIVE

articles.author: Guest Author
articles.description:
Updates for the majority of October, as the main story reaches its climax


Heyas, Knights! While strictly speaking, Halloween festivities may be quickly approaching their end in the world of Astraea, we’ve still got a thematic new crossover character to introduce everyone to. Read on for more!
articles.title: Princess Connect! Re: Dive Meets Shadowverse’s Luna!

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Series is on the way soon with a home video release to follow


The latest original anime project from P.A. Works (Ya Boy Kongming, Shirobako) has found a home at HIDIVE, which will be streaming Akiba Maid War as part of its Fall 2022 simulcast lineup. Read on for more.
articles.title: Akiba Maid War Anime Brings the Battle to HIDIVE This Fall

articles.author: Humberto Saabedra
articles.description:
Manga also known as Too Cute Crisis currently published since 2019 in Japan


The Kawaisugi Crisis manga authored by Mitsuru Kido also known as Too Cute Crisis is getting a TV anime. Read on for the initial details and confirmation.
articles.title: Kawaisugi Crisis Manga Gets TV Anime Adaptation In 2023

articles.author: Nick Creamer
articles.description:
Let's highlight some characters who could use the extra attention!


My Hero Academia's sprawling ensemble cast means it's frankly tough for any one season to give them all their due. Today on Why It Works, let's highlight some of the heroes who deserve to return to the main stage!
articles.title: FEATURE: Five Characters I'm Excited to See in the Next My Hero Academia Season

articles.author: Kara Dennison
articles.description:
What does anime's greatest thief have in store for Japan's fast food restaurants?


Lupin the Third has stolen hearts, works of art, cryptocurrency, and the Statue of Liberty. Now, it seems he has his eye on fast food chain McDonald's. What is he after? Only time will tell—for now, we're taking a look at the newly-teased collaboration after the jump!
articles.title: Lupin the Third Sets His Sights on McDonald's in Shadowy Teaser

articles.author: Paul Chapman
articles.description:
Main staff, key cast, and key visual revealed for upcoming production based on Kamen Rider W sequel


Kamen Rider will soon be investigating the Japanese theater scene, because a stage play adaptation has been announced for FUUTO PI, the anime sequel series to the 2009 live-action tokusatsu hero show, Kamen Rider W. Hit the jump to learn more.
articles.title: FUUTO PI Stage Play Investigates with Tokyo & Osaka Productions

articles.author: Liam Dempsey
articles.description:
Teaser visual, trailer and more cast were also revealed


Last year's "Battle of Kimluck" anime will soon be succeeded by "Chaos in Urbanrama", the newly announced third season of Studio DEEN's Sorcerous Stabber Orphen reboot that unveiled a teaser visual, trailer and new cast members today. Hit the jump for all the details!
articles.title: Sorcerous Stabber Orphen Reboot Anime Gets 3rd Season in January 2023

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Jam to some of "Giri Giri Ride it out" by FANTASTICS from EXILE TRIBE


A new promo has arrived for Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun season 3, which is set to continue the fun on Japanese TV and on Crunchyroll this October. Read on for more.
articles.title: Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun Season 3 Trailer Previews Opening Theme Song

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
It was recently rebranded from a SEGA arcade to GiGO


For many who travel all the way to Akihabara, one of the first places you see coming out of the JR train station Electric Town gate is the arcade. But that is no more as the recognizable has closed its doors for the last night. Read on for more.
articles.title: Akihabara’s Most Recognizable Arcade Closes Down

articles.author: Liam Dempsey
articles.description:
An all-new school and ensemble await this December


More than ten years after the project first launched, the Love Live! franchise is officially heading to theaters in Tokyo and Osaka for a musical adaptation that will feature a completely original story and ensemble. A teaser visual and cast photos were released, so hit the jump for all the details!
articles.title: Love Live! Franchise Steps into a New Arena with Original Stage Musical

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
DAM and Big Echo will feature the upcoming TV anime franchise


To celebrate the broadcast of the Chainsaw Man TV anime, the series will be collaborating with one of Japan's biggest karaoke vendors DAM as well as karaoke house Big Echo, which has locations all over the country. For the announcement, a new visual drawn by anime studio MAPPA of Chainsaw Man was released. Check out the buzz after the jump!
articles.title: Chainsaw Man Takes on Karaoke Boxes Across Japan in New Collab

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
The anime's insert song "Zutto ChamJam" is used in the drama as well


The official website for the forthcoming live-action TV drama adaptation of Auri Hirao's underground idol-themed yuri comedy manga If My Favorite Pop Idol Made It to the Budokan, I would Diehas posted a teaser PV to introduce its main cast members. Meet them in the live-action world after the jump!
articles.title: If My Favorite Pop Idol Made It to the Budokan, I Would Die TV Drama Drops Teaser PV

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
All the songs from the entire franchise will be playable


At the Love Live! School Idol Festival Series Fan Appreciation Festival 2022 event last night in Japan, the franchise announced that an official sequel for the smartphone game will be released. Titled Love Live! School Idol Festival 2 Miracle Live!, the game will feature every school idol band from the Love Live! franchise thus far! Dance after the jump for more!
articles.title: Love Live! School Idol Festival Gets Miracle Live! Sequel Smartphone Game

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
Yuki Kaji: "It is the heroes who show us hope, and I believe that is the appeal of this work."


To promote its highly-anticipated sixth season, the official website and Twitter for the My Hero Academia anime franchise has launched a character special visual project, which will introduce newly-drawn visuals of five notable characters in the new season one by one. Check out its first entry, Shoto Todoroki after the jump!
articles.title: Shoto Todoroki Shows Off His Cool Look in My Hero Academia Season 6 Character Special Visual Project

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
The website will be in multiple languages including English


You better believe that after multiple decades Naruto is finally getting his own official place on the internet with the official Japanese-team-run Naruto website. Though the website fully launches on October 3, a new manga visual is displayed on the front page! Naruto-run past the jump for more!
articles.title: Naruto Takes His Ninjutsu to the Net in First Official Franchise Website

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
Mizuki: "I want to bring down their spirits in my live concerts."


The official YouTube channel for voice actress / singer Nana Mizuki has posted a 30-second promo to announce the titles of her forthcoming two-day concert to be held at Saitama Super Arena on January 21 and 22, 2023. The main title is "NANA MIZUKI LIVE HEROES 2023." Hit the jump for more details including her video message!
articles.title: Nana Mizuki's Saitama Super Arena Two-day Concert to Feature Her Hero/Heroine Songs

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
The sequel to the anime is in production!


The 10th volume of the ever-popular romantic comedy cosplay manga My Dress-Up Darling was released in stores on September 24, gracing Japan with the latest hijinks of Marin and Gojo. On the release of the volume, manga creator Shinichi Fukuda revealed that the series has surpassed 7.5 million copies! More after the jump!
articles.title: My Dress-Up Darling Manga Crosses 7.5 Million Copies Released

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
TV anime series has been aired since October 2021


Waccha PriMagi!, the ongoing latest installment of Takara Tomy Arts's idol-themed Pretty Series, has posted a teaser trailer for a new game project titled Waccha PriMagi! Studio to announce its November 2022 launch. Watch the clip of Myamu busily preparing something after the jump!
articles.title: Waccha PriMagi! Franchise Teases New Project "Waccha PriMagi! Studio" for November 2022 Launch

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
PiXEL plans 2023 release with English and Japanese support


Angelian Trigger is a new shoot 'em up that blends 2D and 3D visuals, and it's on the way to Nintendo Switch sometime in 2023. Check out a new teaser after the jump.
articles.title: Angelian Trigger Shoot 'Em Up Teased for Nintendo Switch

articles.author: Humberto Saabedra
articles.description:
Multiple new anime titles unveiled 


Overnight, Netflix held its Tudum fan event in Japan to showcase new anime series launching on the service in the future. Read on for the details.
articles.title: Moonrise, Onimusha And More New Anime Unveiled During Netflix's Tudum Japan Event

articles.author: Kathleen Townsend
articles.description:
Reading manga is one thing, but creating it? Phew! 


Anime featuring everyone's favorite manga creators, industry professionals, and wholehearted fans are a great way to round off your National Comic Book Day celebrations. Settle in with one of these 5 amazing anime.
articles.title: FEATURE: Happy National Comic Book Day! Here's Some Great Anime About Creating Manga

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Tokatsu DJ Agetaro director Akitaro Daichi is at the helm


Following up on the recent 'knee-ser' visual, the full key visual has been revealed along with the main staff and studio for the Me & Roboco TV anime, which adapts the comedy manga by Shuhei Miyazaki. Read on for more.
articles.title: Me & Roboco Anime Reveals Full Key Visual, Main Staff and Studio

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Shinya Sugai directs the series, with lead character Miyamoto Musashi modeled after Toshiro Mifune


An anime was announced for Capcom's Onimusha series of horror action games, with film director Takashi Miike (Dead or Alive, Ichi the Killer) serving as chief director at anime production house Sublimation. Read on for more.
articles.title: Onimusha Games Get Anime With Takashi Miike as Chief Director

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
“We sincerely apologize for causing concerns and inconvenience to [the lodge]”


In the sixth episode of the latest season of the Love Live! Superstar!! TV anime a few of the girls of Liella! head up to the town of Furano in Hokkaido. Throughout the episode, various well-known locations from the town are featured but not explicitly named, though that didn't stop fans from working out which places were featured and overwhelming them. More after the jump.
articles.title: Love Live! Superstar!! Staff Issues Apology to Hokkaido Lodge That Resembled Location Used in the Anime

articles.author: Liam Dempsey
articles.description:
Comedy anime by Studio Bind begins in January 2023


With a promising staff and cast list already lined up for a January 2023 premiere, upcoming comedy anime ONIMAI: I'm Now Your Sister! continued its pre-transformation by revealing the opening and ending theme song titles and artists. Hit the jump for all the details!
articles.title: ONIMAI: I'm Now Your Sister! TV Anime Reveals Theme Song Details

articles.author: Paul Chapman
articles.description:
Sci-fi rom-com series will broadcast in Japan and stream on HIDIVE beginning in October of 2022


A new key visual featuring the five leading ladies of the series has been published for Love Flops (known in Japan as Renai Flops), an upcoming original science fiction / romantic comedy anime about a young man who ends up living alongside a harem of heroines. Hit the jump to learn more.
articles.title: Heroines Gather in New Key Visual for Love Flops TV Anime

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
Season 2 also confirmed to be a continuous two-cour run


During the TOHO 10th Anniversary event tonight in Japan, the special JUJUTSU KAISEN stage revealed the next teaser visual for the second season featuring Gojo Satoru, Yuji Itadori, Megumi Fushiguro and Nobara Kugisaki with the subtitle “The Shibuya Incident.” More details on season two of JUJUTSU KAISEN after the jump!
articles.title: JUJUTSU KAISEN Season 2 TV Anime Shares Newest Teaser Visual

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Series heads to TV in Japan and HIDIVE this October


The TV anime adaptation of I've Somehow Gotten Stronger When I Improved My Farm-Related Skills is on the way October 1, and the official accounts just shared a clean, creditless look at the opening movie.
articles.title: I've Somehow Gotten Stronger When I Improved My Farm-Related Skills Anime Previews Clean OP Movie

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
The first season is currently streaming here on Crunchyroll


After revealing a little over a week ago that the romantic-comedy TV anime Girlfriend, Girlfriend would be getting a second season, the official announcement art for Girlfriend, Girlfriend season two was released on the Twitter account for the series. Take a look at the visual after the jump!
articles.title: All the Girls Line Up for Girlfriend, Girlfriend TV Anime Season 2 Teaser Visual

articles.author: Paul Chapman
articles.description:
Pre-orders currently available for Good Smile Company's non-scale figure of the roly-poly knight


If you find yourself in quite a pickle and you feel like you could use a little help in your adventures, then Good Smile Company has got you covered, because pre-orders are now available online for Nendoroid Siegmeyer, a non-scale figure of everyone's favorite onion-armored knight from the Dark Souls video game developed by FromSoftware and published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. Hit the jump to find yourself in a spot of bother.
articles.title: Round Out Your Adventures With Nendoroid Siegmeyer From Dark Souls

articles.author: Paul Chapman
articles.description:
"I'm not upset..."


Just when you thought it was safe to go back on the Internet, the Pop Team Epic TV has decided to throw a wrench in the gears with a 72-hour "endurance marathon" of the "Bob ne Mimimi" segments of the series streaming on Youtube. Hit the jump to check it out, if you dare.
articles.title: Pop Team Epic TV Anime Unleashes 72-Hour Bob Ne Mimimi Marathon

articles.author: Daniel Dockery
articles.description:
Hear me out: It makes us feel closer to them


Since Digimon have existed, they've been pooping all over the place. And while this might seem like a funny gag or a simple quirk of virtual pets, it actually says something about Digimon's relationship with us and their pseudo-biology. Hit the jump to find out more!
articles.title: FEATURE: Pooping Is One Of Digimon's Most Meaningful Aspects

articles.author: Nada Ali
articles.description:
Refresh your memory before the next mission begins this October!


The first cour of SPY x FAMILY was a sheer banger when it debuted last spring season. While we wait for the second cour, how about a little refresher about what has happened so far? Hit the jump!
articles.title: FEATURE: What You Need to Know Before SPY x FAMILY Returns

articles.author: Kara Dennison
articles.description:
Kotaro and Romero join the brawl as the project continues into its third wave


Franchouchou continues to tighten its adorable grip on Saga Prefecture! The stars of ZOMBIE LAND SAGA are once again taking center stage on a series of decorated manhole covers, marking the third wave of the zombie idol group's attack. And this time, their manager and mascot are along for the ride! Have a closer look after the jump.
articles.title: Franchouchou Takes on Saga with Nine New ZOMBIE LAND SAGA Manhole Covers

articles.author: Kara Dennison
articles.description:
The creator of 750 Rider and Kutabare!! Namida-kun was honored in a private ceremony


Today, we learned of the passing of manga author Isami Ishii on September 17. The creator of titles like Rider 750 and Kutabare!! Namida-kun was 80 years old at the time of his death. We remember his career and accomplishments after the jump.
articles.title: Manga Author Isami Ishii Passes Away at 80

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Voice actors revealed for various idol units ahead of premiere


What started as a YouTube project in 2021 is about to come to the world of TV, because Sony Music's UniteUp! idol project is officially getting an anime adaptation from CloverWorks. Read on for more.
articles.title: UniteUp! Idol Project Inspires TV Anime in January 2023

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Both the Japanese and English-dubbed versions are in the works


Fate/strange Fake -Whispers of Dawn- is set to air during the Fate New Year's TV Special on December 31, and a teaser trailer was posted along with the news. Read on for more.
articles.title: Fate/strange Fake -Whispers of Dawn- Anime Special to Air on New Year's Eve

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
PC release planned for game by SWAN SONG's Renya Setoguchi


In addition to anime announcements at Aniplex Online Fest 2022, the company's visual novel branch was on hand for a new reveal. Read on for more.
articles.title: ANIPLEX.EXE Reveals Hirahira Hihiru Visual Novel for 2023

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Check out the latest preview along with a new key visual!


A new trailer and visual have arrived for the Arknights anime adaptation, Arknights [PRELUDE TO DAWN], which is officially set to premiere on October 28. Read on for more.
articles.title: Arknights Anime Shows Off New Trailer Ahead of October 28 Premiere

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
The all-out war between heroes and villains will light up screens for half a year


We've got a lot of My Hero Academia to look forward to, because the latest update has confirmed season six as a two-cour consecutive run. Read on for more.
articles.title: My Hero Academia Season 6 to Air for Two Consecutive Cours

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Teaser visual, promo, main cast and staff members revealed


One of the reveals made during Aniplex Online Fest 2022 concerned plans for the Saint Cecilia and Pastor Lawrence anime, which is officially on the way to Crunchyroll. Read on for more.
articles.title: Crunchyroll to Stream Saint Cecilia and Pastor Lawrence Anime

articles.author: Liam Dempsey
articles.description:
Studio MADHOUSE produces adaptation of rom-com manga


A strong internet connection as well as a personal one is at the heart of Loving Yamada at Lv999!, which announced that a TV anime adaptation is in the works at studio MADHOUSE with the release of a teaser visual, trailer, staff and cast. Hit the jump for all the details!
articles.title: Chihayafuru Director Helms Loving Yamada at Lv999! TV Anime for 2023 Broadcast

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
Seiji Mizushima chief directs the film at A-1 Pictures


It's time to take to the skies in a brand new anime film from the mind of Puella Magi Madoka Magica writer Gen Urobuchi as his novel Eisen Flügel was announced to be getting an anime adaptation at anime studio A-1 Pictures. A teaser trailer and visual were released alongside the main staff members which can be watched past the jump!
articles.title: Gen Urobuchi's Eisen Flügel Novel Gets Anime Film

articles.author: Liam Dempsey
articles.description:
Adaptation by CONNECT begins airing in January 2023


The male and female versions of Matsuri, plus Suzu and Shirogane now have a voice thanks to Aniplex Online Fest 2022, which unveiled the main cast and a second teaser visual for the upcoming Ayakashi Triangle anime series. Hit the jump for all the details!
articles.title: Ayakashi Triangle TV Anime Uncovers Main Cast, New Teaser Visual

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
The first anime adaptation is streaming here on Crunchyroll


Dreams do come true as the Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai anime is confirmed to be getting a sequel anime combining the next two books in the original light novel series. All the details after the jump!
articles.title: Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai Anime Gets Sequel

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
The muscles and magic anime adaptation is to air in 2023


Mash uses all of his might to conquer magical society only using the magnificent muscles he’s worked hard for in the upcoming MASHLE: MAGIC AND MUSCLES TV anime. Today at Aniplex Online Fest 2022, the titular character Mash got his voice actor announced alongside the first teaser trailer and main staff. Smash past the jump for more!
articles.title: Chiaki Kobayashi Muscles His Way Into Voicing Lead in MASHLE TV Anime

articles.author: Liam Dempsey
articles.description:
Yuichiro Umehara takes on the mantle of Anos for split-cour sequel


After a two-year absence since its first season in 2020, The Misfit of Demon King Academy has found its place again among the Winter 2023 anime season, revealing a key visual and the first trailer for Season 2 during the Aniplex Online Fest 2022 livestream event today. Hit the jump for all the details!
articles.title: The Misfit of Demon King Academy Season 2 Sets January 2023 Premiere with New Visual, Trailer

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
The first teaser trailers and visuals of 2B and 9S were released


After a long wait for more news on the NieR:Automata TV anime adaptation of the popular video game, this weekend's Aniplex Online Fest 2022 event revealed a bunch of new information on the series, including its January 2023 premiere, the first teaser trailers, the voice actors and visuals for 2B and 9S, as well as the new Ver. 1.1a designation. All of this is after the jump!
articles.title: NieR:Automata TV Anime Confirms Version Number, January 2023 Broadcast

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
Meet Kouseki Misaki and Tastumi Tanabe from the incoming rom-com


Tomo-chan Is a Girl! is prepping for its January 2023 debut, which means the anticipated rom-com had some updates to share at this weekend’s Aniplex Online Fest, including the introduction of a pair of characters from the series! Check out the latest information after the jump!
articles.title: Tomo-chan Is a Girl! Reveals New Character Trailer, Additional Cast at Aniplex Online Fest

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
A special video message was also shared


This fall marks the official premiere of Berserk: The Golden Age Arc - Memorial Edition, which celebrates the work of the late Kentaro Miura in a new way starting October 1. This weekend's Aniplex Online Fest 2022 event came through with a new trailer and a special video message to get everyone ready to revisit Guts’ story. Slice past the jump to check it out!
articles.title: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc - Memorial Edition TV Anime Delivers New Trailer

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
The wait ends on October 10


After 10 years, the story of Ichigo and his friend continues in the Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War TV anime. To get fans prepped for the four-season series, at this weekend's Aniplex Online Fest 2022 event a short new trailer was released showing more of the light-hearted side of Tite Kubo's creation. Check it out after the jump!
articles.title: Bleach: Thousand-Year Blood War TV Anime Gets Short and Fun New Trailer

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
A teaser trailer was released for the adaptation


The sweet visual novel ATRI -My Dear Moments- is commemorating its second anniversary this year and as part of the celebrations, it was revealed at this weekend's Aniplex Online Fest 2022 event that it'll be getting a TV anime series. A teaser trailer for the anime was released which can be enjoyed after the jump!
articles.title: ATRI -My Dear Moments- Visual Novel Gets TV Anime

articles.author: Liam Dempsey
articles.description:
Crunchyroll is set to stream the series in 2023


Studio Orange and artist Kouji Tajima continue to take us on a ride through the alluring world of TRIGUN STAMPEDE, stopping by slums and a desert spot on the way to 2023 in two new pieces of anime concept art. Hit the jump for the full picture!
articles.title: TRIGUN STAMPEDE Loads Up Another Round of Stunning Anime Concept Art

articles.author: Liam Dempsey
articles.description:
Isekai fantasy sequel comes to Crunchyroll in Winter 2023


"Gorilla" may often be a slight against tsundere characters in anime, but The Fruit of Evolution: Before I Knew It, My Life Had It Made beat its chest with pride to celebrate World Gorilla Day today with the release of a new key visual and cast member. Hit the jump for the full picture!
articles.title: The Fruit of Evolution 2: Before I Knew It, My Life Had It Made Anime Marks World Gorilla Day with New Visuals, Cast

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
Yuichiro Hirakawa (The Promised Neverland)-directed film will open on October 14


A two-minute clip to explore the inside of the "Chikyu-ya" antique shop in the long-awaited live-action film adaptation of Aoi Hiiragi's romantic coming of age manga Whisper of the Heart is now streamed. See how that place, which has important meaning in the story, is created after the jump!
articles.title: Explore The Inside of Chikyu-ya Antique Store in Whisper of The Heart Live-action Film

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
EMT Squared-animated fantasy will be simulcast on Crunchyroll


The official website for five-member Japanese dance and vocal unit MADKID has announced that their seventh major single "Change The World," which will be featured as the opening theme for the fall 2022 TV anime Beast Tamer, is set to be released on November 23, 2022. Check out their new artist photo and the song's teaser MV after the jump!
articles.title: MADKID to Release Fall 2022 TV Anime Beast Tamer Opening Theme on November 23

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
The main scenarios will be written by series composition writer Toya Okano 


After the broadcast of its final 12th episode in Japan last night, the official website for the summer 2022 TV anime Prima Doll announced that its prequel and sequel episodes will be released in the form of a kinetic novel (A form of visual novel that does not give the player a choice). Hit the jump for more details!
articles.title: Prima Doll Anime Gets Prequel/Sequel Kinetic Novel Episodes

articles.author: Humberto Saabedra
articles.description:
Watch to be released in limited run of 600 pieces, 100 bundled with carbon fiber skull mask


In a low-key tweet, high-end watch and apparel brand Anicorn have announced a new collaboration with Kojima Productions and NASA to release a new watch that ties into the video game developer's mascot. Read on for the details.
articles.title: High-End Watch Brand Anicorn Collaborates With Kojima Productions And NASA On Space Ludens Watch

articles.author: Humberto Saabedra
articles.description:
Series begins streaming on September 30


Streaming service HIDIVE has announced a classic series that will premiere on its service at the end of the month in Super Dimension Century Orguss. Read on for the details.
articles.title: HIDIVE To Stream Classic Sci-Fi Anime Super Dimension Century Orguss

articles.author: Guest Author
articles.description:
The pro streamers give us a glimpse at their favorite series


Esports pro TenZ and Twitch streamer Kyedae  have made a name for themselves on Twitch through their competitive play on Valorant (among other games) and have both amassed quite impressive followings. The two streamers recently announced their engagement and have both openly expressed their love of anime, especially Kaguya-sama: Love is War! We’re excited to share a list of their top 10 anime with you today! Hit the jump to read their lists as well as learn about an exciting announcement!
articles.title: RECS: TenZ and Kyedae Share Their Top 10 Anime (and a Special Announcement)

articles.author: Cayla Coats
articles.description:
The LA based record label is bringing decades' worth of music to listeners outside of Japan


The Evangelion franchise has some of the most iconic music in all of anime, and today, Milan Records released two albums of Shiro SAGISU's iconic score! This marks the first time these two albums are available outside of Japan, and both feature music from the original 1995 anime series as well as the Rebuild of Evangelion film series. Hit the jump to learn more and listen to both albums!
articles.title: Two Albums of Evangelion Music Released for the First Time in the US by Milan Records

articles.author: Cayla Coats
articles.description:
We spoke with Motoaki Tanigo, the head of COVER Corp, about his company and the state of VTubing today


Since its founding in 2016, COVER Corp and hololive Production have become synonymous with the burgeoning VTuber industry. Since the debut of hololive Production's first VTuber, Tokino Sora, the company has expanded into three languages and now represents dozens of talent with over 64 million collective subscribers on YouTube alone. We had the pleasure of talking with COVER Corp's CEO Motaki Tanigo about the history of his company, the future of VTubing, and what he thinks about the infamous nickname "YAGOO!" Hit the jump to read!
articles.title: INTERVIEW: hololive Production's CEO on the Origins of VTubing

articles.author: Kelly Knox
articles.description:
We all know Anya Forger loves peanuts. But what else do you know about the tiny troublemaker?


This quick quiz is just as intense as Yor Forger’s hugs. Are you ready to test your Anya knowledge? Find out after the jump!
articles.title: QUIZ: How Well Do You Know SPY x FAMILY’s Anya Forger?

articles.author: Kara Dennison
articles.description:
Lupin and Hitomi pose for Twitter in new piece


Next year, anime's greatest thieves are crossing paths for the first time! Lupin the Third vs. Cat's Eye is coming to Amazon Prime, and character designer Haruhisa Nakata has shared a piece of celebratory art featuring Lupin and Hitomi back-to-back. Check it out after the jump!
articles.title: Haruhisa Nakata Shares Lupin the Third vs. Cat's Eye Team-Up Art

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
Crunchyroll to stream the two-season series this October


Ahead of the starting whistle for the BLUELOCK TV anime, a brand new trailer for the anime was released previewing the ending theme song “WINNER” from Shugo Nakamura alongside the news that the anime will air over two consecutive seasons. Kick the read more button to read on!
articles.title: BLUELOCK TV Anime Heads to the Field in New Video Previewing Ending Theme

articles.author: Kevin Matyi
articles.description:
The data is in! What is the anime that touched the most peoples' lives?


After a week to collect votes and almost 8,000 responses, it's time to finally figure out what are the most influential anime. Which series got over 1,000 votes, and which ones touched a single person's heart? Hit the jump to find out!
articles.title: RESULTS: Which Series Made You Fall in Love With Anime?

articles.author: Joseph Luster
articles.description:
Series premieres in Japan on October 7


The Legend of Mana -The Teardrop Crystal- TV anime is about to light up the fall season with its take on Square Enix's RPG starting on October 7 in Japan. Check out the OP!
articles.title: Legend of Mana -The Teardrop Crystal- Anime Previews OP Movie

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
Mirai Minato returns to direct the series at Silver Link


Before even getting a hint on when the next season of Masamune-kun’s Revenge TV anime will release, the series has released a bunch of new character visuals of its cast, with two more being released today featuring Kojuro Shuri and Kanetsugu Gaso's new Masamune-kun’s Revenge R new visual styles. Check out the designs after the jump!
articles.title: You'll Fall in Love With These New Masamune-kun’s Revenge Season 2 TV Anime Character Designs

articles.author: Paul Chapman
articles.description:
Adaptation based on 4-panel manga by Aki Hamaji hits Japanese TV and Crunchyroll in October of 2022


A new character trailer that introduces Nijika Ijichi, the extroverted drummer of the Kessoku Band, has been published for BOCCHI THE ROCK!, an upcoming TV anime based on the 4-panel manga by Aki Hamaji about an introverted girl who finds begins to come out of her shell after she learns to play the guitar and joins a band. Hit the jump to check it out.
articles.title: Meet the Drummer in New Character PV for BOCCHI THE ROCK! TV Anime

articles.author: Daryl Harding
articles.description:
A new trailer was released for the peaceful in-between anime


At an event today in Ikebukuro for the Fafner in the Azure series, it was announced that the peaceful spin-off anime Fafner in the Azure: BEHIND THE LINE, will be released theatrically in Japan on January 20, 2023. A new trailer for the theatrical run was released to coincide with the news which can be watched after the jump!
articles.title: Fafner in the Azure Spin-off BEHIND THE LINE Gets January 20 Theatrical Release

articles.author: Guest Author
articles.description:
Check out some of the exciting updates that are on the way! 


We have some more exciting Mitrasphere updates coming your way. As we continue to look towards building a better world for all, we will be implementing new changes to ease you on your journey. Read on for more.
articles.title: Mitrasphere: Another Step Forward with Patch 2.2

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
Rie Takahashi: "It's a soooo warm song...!"


KADOKAWA's official anime YouTube channel has started steaming a music video for "my proof," a new character song by Emilia (CV: Rie Takahashi), one of the heroines in the Re:ZERO − Starting Life in Another World franchise. Listen to her sweet singing voice after the jump!
articles.title: Listen to Re:ZERO Heroine Emilia's Sweet Singing Voice for Her Character Song "my proof"

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
Limited edition comes with an Okinawa photo session bonus DVD


Following the initial announcement in July, Japanese publisher Tokyo News Tsushinsha has released new sample photos from anime voice actor Sumire Uesaka's (Nagatoro in DON'T TOY WITH ME, MISS NAGATORO) much-awaited second photo collection book, "Sumire no Yume" (Sumire's Dream). Check out her new smiling photos after the jump!
articles.title: Check Out New Sample Photos from Voice Actor Sumire Uesaka's 2nd Photo Book

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
Lots of "Delicious Smile" projects coming up, including one linked to Twitter


The much-awaited 31st Precure feature film, Delicious Party Pretty Cure the Movie: Dreamy Children's Lunch! is finally released in Japan today on September 23. To celebrate the release, two special programs will be live-streamed on the Precure franchise's official YouTube channel today. Hit the jump for more details!
articles.title: Delicious Party Pretty Cure Film to Stream Two Special Live-streaming Programs on Its Release Day

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
The CD single will be available on November 30


The official website for the fall 2022 TV anime 4-nin wa Sorezore Uso wo Tsuku has announced that its ending theme song "For 4 Forever" is sung by the anime's four main voice cast members - Chiemi Tanaka (Rikka), Natsumi Murakami (Chiyo), Ayane Sakura (Sekine), and Megumi Han (Tsubasa / Tsuyoshi). Check out their message video after the jump!
articles.title: 4 Main VAs to Sing 4-nin wa Sorezore Uso wo Tsuku Anime Ending Theme "For 4 Forever"

articles.author: Mikikazu Komatsu
articles.description:
All-female play will open in Tokyo on October 20


The official website for the forthcoming stage play adaptation of Kei Sazane's romance fantasy light novel series Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World has revealed two key visulals and individual visuals of its main cast members in costume. See how they portray their characters after the jump!
articles.title: Meet Our Last Crusade or the Rise of a New World Stage Play Main Cast Members in Costume

articles.author: Humberto Saabedra
articles.description:
Series helmed by Laid-Back Camp episode director Norihiko Nagahama


Streaming service HIDIVE has announced that I've Somehow Gotten Stronger When I Improved My Farm-Related Skills, which is also known under the shortened and localized title Farming Made Me Stronger will premiere on the service in Ocober. Read on for the details.
articles.title: I've Somehow Gotten Stronger When I Improved My Farm-Related Skills To Premiere On HIDIVE October 1

articles.author: Humberto Saabedra
articles.description:
Pokémon: The Arceus Chronicles special premieres before new series on September 23


The Pokémon Company has confirmed release details for the next series in the ongoing Pokémon anime franchise in Pokémon Ultimate Journeys: The Series along with details on the Pokémon: The Arceus Chronicles special. Read on for all of the details.
articles.title: Pokémon Ultimate Journeys: The Series Gets October US Premiere On Netflix

articles.author: Humberto Saabedra
articles.description:
Carole & Tuesday previously premiered on Netflix outside Japan


Sentai Filmworks has announced that it has acquired the 2019 anime Carole & Tuesday which previously premiered on Netflix outside of Japan. Read on for the details.
articles.title: Sentai Filmworks Acquires Carole & Tuesday Anime For Future Home Video Release

articles.author: Guest Author
articles.description:
The guild leader's tastes have been revealed!


Every team has its leader, and HOLOSTARS English -TEMPUS- has Regis Altare. The founder of the adventurer's guild, Altare's gentle and easygoing earnestness make his streams some of the coziest you can find on all of YouTube. The guild founder shared his list of top 10 anime with us and we're happy to share it here! Hit the jump to read!
articles.title: RECS: VTuber Regis Altare Shares His Top 10 Anime

articles.description: Tokyo
articles.title: PM Modi arrives in Japan to attend former premier Abe's state funeral

articles.title: As Sri Lanka backs freedom of expression at UN, police arrest dozens of protesters at home

articles.title: Bangladesh boat capsize | Death toll rises to 39

articles.title: Canada to remove all COVID border, travel measures from October 1

articles.title: 12 arrested after clashes outside Iranian Embassy in London

articles.title: Six Pakistan Army personnel killed in helicopter crash in Balochistan

articles.author: PTI
articles.description: The avalanche struck the route just below Camp IV of Mount Manaslu when the climbers were ferrying logistics to the high camps.
articles.title: Indian climber among 12 injured as avalanche hits Nepal's Mt. Manaslu

articles.description: The former minister further claimed that the hacker who allegedly leaked these audios had more important audios which are yet to surface.
articles.title: Pakistan's Opposition leader raises concerns on PMO audio leaks, demands thorough investigation

articles.description: U.S. Vice President Kamala Harris has arrived in Tokyo to lead a U.S. delegation to the state funeral of former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe, who was  assassinated in July
articles.title: Kamala Harris calls U.S.-Japan alliance 'a cornerstone' in Tokyo

articles.author: AP
articles.description: Along with the five who were killed, at least 13 other civilians were wounded in the clashes that continued overnight, Libyan Health Ministry’s emergency services said.
articles.title: Renewed militia clashes rock western Libya; five killed

articles.author: AP
articles.description: Prime Minister of Japan Fumio Kishida met U.S. Vice-President Kamala Harris, Vietnamese President Nguyen Xuan Phuc, Philippine Vice-President Sara Duterte and about 10 other foreign dignitaries.
articles.title: Japan PM Fumio Kishida holds series of meetings with foreign dignitaries, a day before he hosts state funeral for Shinzo Abe

articles.author: Sumeda
articles.description: What has triggered the fresh wave of protests in Iran? Why are women demanding ‘death to the dictator’?
articles.title: Explained | Mahsa Amini and the widespread protests in Iran

articles.author: Anantha Krishnan
articles.description: India continued to push strongly for a reformed U.N.-led multilateral system during what was a busy
articles.title: India’s Reforms Push at the UN

articles.author: AP
articles.description: Local police say a gunman has killed six people and wounded 20 others in a school in central Russia.
articles.title: 6 dead, 20 wounded in school shooting in Russia

articles.author: AP
articles.description: Jake Sullivan, the U.S. national security adviser, made clear that Russia would pay a high price if it made good on veiled threats to use nuclear weapons in the conflict
articles.title: Drone attack hits Ukraine; U.S. vows ‘consequences’ over nukes

articles.author: AP
articles.description: The accusation was made after a TV broadcaster released a video suggesting that South Korean President Yoon insulted U.S. Congress members following a meeting with U.S. President Joe Biden in New York last week.
articles.title: President Yoon Suk Yeol accuses South Korea’s media of damaging its alliance with United States

articles.author: AP
articles.description: The latest incident comes weeks after a helicopter carrying a regional commander and five other soldiers crashed in Baluchistan
articles.title: Six killed in Pakistan army helicopter crash

articles.author: AP
articles.description: Cuba is holding a rare referendum on an unusually contentious law — a government-backed code that would allow same-sex couples to marry and adopt
articles.title: Cuba holds unusual vote on law allowing same-sex marriage

articles.author: AP
articles.description: Japan's government on Monday banned the export of materials that may be used for chemical weapons to 21 Russian organizations, including science laboratories
articles.title: Japan bans export of chemical weapons goods to Russia

articles.author: AFP
articles.description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken confirmed reports that the United States has sent private warnings to Russia to steer clear of nuclear war
articles.title: U.S. warns Russia of 'castastrophic' consequences of nuclear strike

articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.description: A select list of stories to read before you start your day
articles.title: Morning Digest | Gehlot camp MLAs threaten to resign if Sachin Pilot made Rajasthan CM; India clinches T20 series against Australia, and more

articles.author: AP
articles.description: Far-right leader Giorgia Meloni’s electoral alliance appears to hold a wide lead in Italy’s national vote, an exit poll on state television suggested shortly after polls closed
articles.title: Italian far-right leader’s alliance leading vote: Exit poll

articles.author: Ananth Krishnan
articles.description: The 2,296 delegates will attend the all-important event that is expected to further bolster the Chinese President Xi Jinping’s sway over the party
articles.title: Chinese Communist Party picks national congress delegates

articles.author: AFP
articles.description: The Vladimir region governor Vladimir Avdeev already said on Saturday that “anyone mobilised by mistake will return home.”
articles.title: Russia vows to fix mistakes after old, sick people mobilised

articles.author: AFP
articles.description: "I'm playing to win, not just to take part," Matteo Salvini, head of the far-right League, told reporters as he went to cast his ballot.

articles.description: Europe News: FRANKFURT: As Europe heads into winter in the throes of an energy crisis, offices are getting chillier.
articles.title: Lights out, ovens off: Europe preps for winter energy crisis

articles.description: The United States will provide $457.5 million in new civilian security aid for Ukraine, a portion of which will be used to support the government's investigation of atrocities, Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Monday.
articles.title: US announces $457.5 million civilian aid for Ukraine

articles.description: China News: GENEVA: The United States and several Western allies presented a proposal on Monday for the UN's main human rights body to hold a special debate over .
articles.title: US, allies push for UN rights body debate on Xinjiang abuses

articles.description: US News: HAVANA: Hurricane Ian moved near the Cayman Islands and closer to western Cuba early Monday on a track to hit the west coast of Florida as a major hur.
articles.title: Hurricane Ian nears Cuba on path to strike US's Florida as Category 4

articles.description: The British government on Monday announced a new package of sanctions linked to what it described as Moscow's "sham" referendums on four regions of eastern Ukraine joining Russia.
articles.title: UK sanctions Russians linked to 'sham' referendums in Ukraine

articles.description: Ukraine's president and security chiefs met on Monday to plan ways to counteract Russia's use of "new types of weapons" after Moscow stepped up attacks in Odesa region using Iranian combat drones, the president's office and a regional official said.
articles.title: Russia steps up attacks with Iranian drones, Ukraine plans defences

articles.description: Youssef al-Qaradawi, an Egyptian cleric who was seen as the spiritual leader of the pan-Arab Muslim Brotherhood, died Monday at the age of 96, according to his official website.
articles.title: Egyptian cleric revered by Muslim Brotherhood dies at 96

articles.description: A gunman was detained after opening fire at a military draft office in Russia's Irkutsk region on Monday, the local governor said.
articles.title: Gunman detained after shooting at Russian draft office in Siberia

articles.description: Moldova may revoke the citizenship of its nationals who go to fight for Russia in Ukraine after being called up because they also hold Russian passports, pro-Western President Maia Sandu said on Monday.
articles.title: Moldova considers sanctions for citizens who fight for Russia in Ukraine

articles.description: China News: GENEVA: Countries are calling for a debate at the United Nations Human Rights council to discuss concerns about China's treatment of Uyghurs and other.
articles.title: Countries call for UN human rights debate about China's Xinjiang

articles.description: Petro Kobernik, who left the Russian-held southern city of Kherson just before the preordained voting began on Friday, said the prospect of living under Russian law and the escalating war made him and others extremely jittery about the future.
articles.title: Ukrainians scared by Russia's preordained referendums

articles.description: A gunman killed six people at a school in the Russian city of Izhevsk, Russia's interior ministry said in a statement on Telegram. The Udmurtia branch of the interior ministry said the gunman had killed himself and that 20 people were wounded. Alexander Brechalov,  governor of the Udmurtia region, said that there were dead and wounded among the school students.
articles.title: Six victims, gunman dead after shooting at school in Russia's Izhevsk

articles.description: A gunman killed six people at a school in the Russian city of Izhevsk, Russia's interior ministry said in a statement on Telegram. The Udmurtia branch of the interior ministry said the gunman had killed himself and that 20 people were wounded. Alexander Brechalov,  governor of the Udmurtia region, said that there were dead and wounded among the school students.
articles.title: Six victims, gunman dead after shooting at school in Russia's Izhevsk

articles.description: Nikita spent two days in traffic before he made it to Georgia, one of the thousands of Russian men seeking to evade the Ukraine war draft. The latest wave of Russian exiles since the war began in February has seen military-aged men pour into the Caucasus country -- by cars in a column stretching for some 20 kilometres, by bicycles and some walking kilometres by foot to the border crossing.
articles.title: 'I'm no cannon fodder': Russians flee to Georgia

articles.description: Ukraine has discovered two more mass burial sites containing the bodies of hundreds of people in the northeastern town of Izium, which Kyiv recaptured from Russia this month, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said. "The sanctions need to continue. These sanctions will have political impact, as well as financial impact," he said.
articles.title: Ukraine's Zelenskyy says two more burial sites found in liberated Izium

articles.description: MBC caught Yoon on tape talking to his aides and top diplomats following a brief chat with Biden on the margins of the U.N. General Assembly meetings. While the audio was unclear, Yoon could be heard using what seemed as indecent language during comments the broadcaster captioned as: “Wouldn’t it be too darn embarrassing for Biden if those idiots at legislature don’t approve?”
articles.title: South Korea's president scolds media over hot mic moment

articles.description: This summer's flooding, caused by monsoon rains nearly triple the usual ferocity, wiped out huge swaths of crops, leaving already impoverished families struggling to obtain food. Farmers and officials warn that Pakistan could now face serious food shortages.
articles.title: Pakistan floods raise fears of hunger after crops wrecked

articles.description: The helicopter crashed during a "flying mission" near Harnai in the province of Balochistan, the military's public relations wing said in a statement. No reason for the crash was given.
articles.title: Pakistani military helicopter crashes killing six soldiers

articles.description: "Giorgia Meloni has won", Italy's biggest-circulation daily, Corriere della Sera, splashed on its frontpage, while the right-leaning Il Tempo ran with "It's Giorgia's turn".
articles.title: Giorgia Meloni set to lead Italy after right triumphs at polls

articles.description: China News: HONG KONG: Next month, chairman Xi Jinping will extend his term in power for another five years, as the ruling Chinese Communist Party (CCP) conducts .
articles.title: Xi Jinping prepares to extend his reign at 20th Party Congress

articles.description: Europe News: Two drones launched by Russian forces into the Odesa region in Ukraine hit military objects causing a fire and the detonation of ammunition, the South.
articles.title: Ukraine military says Russian drones hit military objects in Odesa

articles.description: Cardinal Joseph Zen, who is a retired bishop of Hong Kong, was first arrested in May together with others including singer Denise Ho and barrister Margaret Ng on suspicion of colluding with foreign forces to endanger China's national security.
articles.title: Cardinal Zen, 5 others stand trial in Hong Kong over fund

articles.description: Typhoon Noru blew out of the northern Philippines on Monday, leaving five rescuers dead, causing floods and power outages
articles.title: In pics: Typhoon Noru hits northern Philippines

articles.description: Every year, Hasidic Jewish pilgrims come to Uman in central Ukraine from across the world to visit the tomb of one of the main figures of Hasidic Judaism for the Jewish new year celebration of Rosh Hashanah. Uman is relatively far from the frontline, but Ukrainian and Israeli authorities still urged worshippers to skip the celebrations taking place between September 25 and 27 this year.
articles.title: Tens of thousands of Jewish pilgrims in Ukraine despite war

articles.description: The South Pacific nation is among 14 outside of the United Kingdom that continue to recognise the British monarch as their symbolic head of state. New Zealand had decided to wait until after last week's funeral in Britain to hold its own commemoration.
articles.title: New Zealand marks queen's death with holiday, church service

articles.description: The most powerful typhoon to hit the country this year slammed into the coast in Burdeos town in Quezon province before nightfall on Sunday then weakened as it barreled overnight across the main Luzon region, where thousands of people were moved to emergency shelters, some forcibly, officials said.
articles.title: Powerful typhoon leaves 5 rescuers dead in north Philippines

articles.description: Meloni's Brothers of Italy came top in Sunday's elections, according to the first exit polls, while her right-wing coalition looked set to secure a majority in both houses of parliament.
articles.title: Giorgia Meloni: Italy's far-right 'Christian mother' on brink of power

articles.description: Purported audio clips of talks between leaders of Pakistan’s ruling party has been leaked online. One of the clips involves conversation held in the PM House among senior leaders of the ruling Pakistan Muslim League-Nawaz. Another audio clip is purportedly about a conversation between PML-N vice president Maryam Nawaz and PM Shehbaz Sharif about finance minister Ismail.
articles.title: Audio of Pak ministers’ talks held inside PM house leaked online

articles.description: Giorgia Meloni, head of the nationalist Brothers of Italy party, said on Monday Italian voters had given a clear mandate to the right to form the next government and called for unity to help confront the country's many problems. "If we are called upon to govern this nation, we will do so for all Italians, with the aim of uniting the people, of exalting what unites them rather than what divides them," Meloni said.
articles.title: Italy's Meloni calls for unity after election victory

articles.description: Three people, including two teenagers, were wounded by gunfire late Saturday at an amusement park southeast of Pittsburgh, which was kicking off a Halloween-themed festival.
articles.title: US: 3 wounded in shooting at amusement park near Pittsburgh

articles.description: China News: BEIJING: Prominent Chinese commentator Hu Xijin said on Sunday that as China ponders its Covid-19 policies, epidemic experts need to speak out and Chi.
articles.title: Prominent Chinese commentator urges Covid experts to 'speak out'

articles.description: The United States would respond decisively to any Russian use of nuclear weapons against Ukraine and has spelled out to Moscow the "catastrophic consequences" it would face, US National Security Adviser Jake Sullivan said on Sunday.
articles.title: US warns Putin of 'catastrophic' consequences if nuclear weapons used in Ukraine

articles.description: Pakistan's former prime minister Imran Khan said on Sunday that his government had snapped trade ties with India after New Delhi revoked the special status of Jammu and Kashmir in 2019 and claimed that the Shehbaz Sharif-led government wanted to resume it.
articles.title: Shehbaz Sharif-led govt wants to resume trade ties with India: Imran Khan

articles.description: Super Typhoon Noru slammed into the Philippines Sunday, battering the heavily populated main island of Luzon with strong winds and heavy rain that have forced thousands of people to flee their homes.
articles.title: Super Typhoon Noru slams into the Philippines

articles.description: At least 24 people were killed and around the same number were missing on Sunday after an overcrowded boat carrying Hindu pilgrims capsized on a river in Bangladesh, police said.
articles.title: Bangladesh ferry accident kills 24, dozens missing

articles.description: Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez said Sunday he had tested positive for Covid and temporarily suspended all engagements just two days after returning from the UN General Assembly meeting.
articles.title: Spanish PM tests positive for Covid

articles.description: UK News: LONDON: British foreign minister James Cleverly will begin a three-day trip to Japan, the Republic of Korea and Singapore on Monday, the foreign minis.
articles.title: Britain's foreign minister to begin Asia trip on Monday

articles.description: Pope Francis traveled to southern Italy on Sunday to close out an Italian church congress that coincided with Italy’s national election, and delivered a message that hit on key domestic campaign issues including immigration.
articles.title: Pope urges Italians to have more children, welcome migrants

articles.description: Gov. Ron DeSantis declared a state of emergency for all of Florida on Saturday as Tropical Storm Ian gained strength over the Caribbean and was forecast to become a major hurricane soon on a track toward the state.
articles.title: US: Florida emergency declared as Tropical Storm Ian strengthens

articles.description: The protests broke out in northwestern Iran a week ago at the funeral of Mahsa Amini, a 22-year-old Kurdish woman who died after falling into a coma following her detention in Tehran by morality police enforcing hijab rules on women's dress.

articles.description: Saudi Arabia has won a diplomatic victory by securing freedom for foreign fighters captured in Ukraine, signalling the value of the crown prince's alliance with Russia to Western partners seeking to isolate Moscow over the war there, analysts say.

articles.description: Before publication of opinion polls were banned 15 days ago, far-right leader Giorgia Meloni and her Brothers of Italy party, with its neo-fascist roots, led in popularity, suggesting Italians were poised to vote their first far-right government into power since World War II. Close behind was former Premier Enrico Letta and his center-left Democratic Party.
articles.title: Italians vote in election that could take far-right to power

articles.description: There was no corroborative reporting from any reputed international news outlet, however, and the Chinese foreign ministry was silent. There were no reports on the subject from Chinese media either. Some websites said the rumours were unfounded and they were part of an anti-Xi conspiracy.

articles.description: US News: McLEAN, Virginia: The CIA has revealed a model of Ayman al-Zawahri’s safe house, used to brief President Joe Biden about the al-Qaida leader’s whereab.
articles.title: CIA unveils model of al-Qaida leader al-Zawahri's hideout

articles.description: After days of denunciations of Russia at the prominent diplomatic gathering, foreign minister Sergey Lavrov sought to shift the focus to Washington. His speech centered on a claim that the United States and its allies — not Russia, as the West maintains — are aggressively undermining the international system that the UN represents.
articles.title: On Ukraine, Russia repeats insistence that it had no choice

articles.description: A digression by US President Joe Biden during his address to teachers at the National Education Association headquarters in Washinton DC on Saturday has bewildered netizens. In his Friday speech to teachers, Biden abruptly digressed from his speech and while recognizing an audience member said, "You gotta say hi to me."
articles.title: 'She was 12, I was 30': Social media lights up over Biden's remark

articles.description: Middle East News: TEHRAN: At least 35 have been killed in more than a week of protests that erupted in Iran after the death of a young woman in police custody, state me.
articles.title: At least 35 dead in Iran protests

articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: Legislators and ministers loyal to Rajasthan chief minister Ashok Gehlot quit en masse on late Sunday ahead of a scheduled Congress legisla.
articles.title: Ashok Gehlot camp MLAs quit; minister alleges conspiracy to remove CM: Key developments

articles.description: Popular Front of India (PFI) officebearers, many of whom have been in detention, used Abu Dhabi’s Darbar restaurant as the den for all hawala transactions and their illegal transfer to India, the Enforcement Directorate has said. This is contrary to the claims made by PFI that most of the Rs 120 crore it had received came through petty cash donations in India.
articles.title: PFI used Abu Dhabi restaurant as hub for hawala deals: ED

articles.description: Social media has been abuzz with rumours since Saturday that Chinese president Xi Jinping has been deposed in a coup that began unfolding while he was away in Uzbekistan attending the Shanghai Cooperation Organisation Summit.

articles.description: Days before her cold-blooded murder, Ankita Bhandari, a 19-year-old receptionist at an Uttarakhand resort owned by Pulkit Arya, son of now-expelled BJP leader Vinod Arya, had told one of her close friends about the pressure she was facing from the accused to indulge in prostitution and "service hotel guests". In one such WhatsApp message to her friend, Ankita wrote: "I may be poor, but I won't sell myself for Rs 10,000."
articles.title: 'I may be poor, but won't sell myself for Rs 10,000': Ankita Bhandari told friend on WhatsApp

articles.description: Daughters' day is celebrated on different days in different countries. In India, the day is celebrated every year on the fourth Sunday of September. This year it falls on September 26. Daughters' day is all about appreciating the presence of the little angels in one's life.
articles.title: Happy Daughters Day 2022: Wishes, Messages, Quotes, Images, Facebook & Whatsapp status

In his Friday speech to teachers, Biden abruptly digressed from his speech and while recognizing an audience member said, "You gotta say hi to me."

articles.description: Query: My wife doesn't want to live with my parents and so we live separately. But I don't want my parents to live in our old, tiny house. My wife shouts and behaves badly whenever my parents are not there and she back-bites all the time. But when my parents are there, she behaves like the perfect daughter-in-law. How can I ask my wife to be more understanding?
articles.title: "My wife refuses to stay with my parents in the same house"

articles.description: The annual package of a male model comes to around INR 30 lakhs per annum and female models get around 40 lakhs.

articles.description: With an evolving global economy, the banking and finance industry is constantly booming. The sector is undergoing rapid expansion due to various monetary regulations, policy updations and complete digitalisation that have changed the banking landscape around the globe. The Covid-19 pandemic also contributed to the drastic transformation of the BFSI sector, which led India to witness a growth rate of 8.5% per annum in the financial sector, as per the.
articles.title: Stay ahead of the curve with industry-ready knowledge of the BFSI sector with the Executive Programme for Banking and Financial Sector (EPBFS) from IIM Calcutta

articles.description: Doing justice to the literal meaning of innovation is Avishkaar, an ed-tech startup started by Tarun Bhalla in the year 2010. It envisions providing the young cohort with learnings around next-generation tech skills which include AI, Coding, Robotics, IoT, Electronics etc. The company offers a platform for young innovators to learn all these skills through hardware kits, software solutions and a vibrant learning community. It aims to inspire children to build something ingenious and groundbreaking.
articles.title: Avishkaar: A startup providing hardware kits on Amazon to help kids learn next-gen tech skills easily

articles.description: Rahee Ambani’s dream was to become an entrepreneur. And history is testimony to the fact that every aspiring entrepreneur goes through a series of ups and downs before their business eventually takes flight. After graduating from the London School of Economics, Rahee found herself in a similar situation. Little did she know that she would soon find a pillar of support in Amazon.
articles.title: Terravita: Fulfilling India’s nutritional needs and creating job opportunities for local communities

articles.description: Even as Congress termed the boycott by MLAs close to Rajasthan chief minister Ashok Gehlot "gross indiscipline", it is learned that the party is scrambling to salvage the situation and has reached out to the state leadership. The party brass is in a dilemma owing to the AICC presidential election, for which Gehlot is the top contender.
articles.title: Gehlot camp boycott 'gross indiscipline': Congress

articles.description: The Alimuddin Street puja was revived by local Muslims after a 16-year break last year. This time, nuns from Missionaries of Charity will join their Hindu neighbours in the carnival. A six-member all-Muslim committee is in charge here.
articles.title: Kolkata's Muslim-organised Pujas

articles.description: Italy took a sharp turn to the right on Monday after Giorgia Meloni's Eurosceptic populist party swept to victory in general elections, putting the one-time Mussolini admirer on course to become the first woman to lead the country.
articles.title: Far-right leader to be Italy's first woman PM

articles.description: Unlike CUET-UG, NTA has announced subject-wise toppers for the postgraduate entrance exam. Among universities, BHU received the maximum number of 3.5 lakh applications, followed by JNU with 2.3 lakh.
articles.title: BHU gets 3.5L applications, JNU sees 2.3L

articles.description: The Delhi high court on Monday refused to stay the Centre's order dismissing senior IPS officer Satish Chandra Verma a month before his scheduled retirement. Verma had assisted the CBI in its probe of the 2004 Ishrat Jahan encounter case between April 2010 and October 2011.
articles.title: HC refuses to stay dismissal of Ishrat case officer

articles.description: Delhi's PM10 level reduced from 241g/m3 in 2017 to 196 g/m3 in 2021-22. Similarly, the PM10 level in Mumbai reduced from 151g/m3 in 2017 to 106 g/m3 in 2021-22 whereas it reduced from 119 g/m3 in 2017 to 105 g/m3 in Kolkata in 2021-22.
articles.title: Centre sets stiffer air pollution reduction target

articles.description: First-time Congress MLA Divya Maderna, scion of the Maderna political family, on Monday said that the condition put forth for the CLP resolution by Gehlot-loyalist MLAs was tantamount to party indiscipline.
articles.title: 1st-time MLA reminds Gehlot camp of history

articles.description: Foreign minister S Jaishankar publicly expressed India's displeasure over the $450 million sustainment package for Pakistan's F-16 fleet as he said Washington was "not fooling any- body" by claiming the fighter jets were meant for counter-terrorism purposes.
articles.title: Not fooling anybody: EAM slams Pakistan package

articles.description: The Rashtriya Indian Military College (RIMC) inducted two girls for the first time in the institution's history of over 100 years, reports Pankul Sharma. The 'July batch of 2022' began on Monday with students of Class 8, including the two girl students. Central command PRO Shantanu Pratap Singh termed it "a historic moment for the college". He said one of the girl students is from Haryana and the other is a day scholar. The decision on RIMC came after the Centre opened the doors of the NDA for women.
articles.title: In a first, 2 girls inducted into Rashtriya Indian Military College

articles.description: Observing that it is a legitimate expectation of a person to get expeditious hearing on bail petition, the SC expressed its displeasure over the Bombay HC for keeping bail plea of ex-Maharashtra home minister Anil Deshmukh pending for the last six months and asked the HC to grant him a hearing during the course of the week. The SC said that HC even failed to implement its order.
articles.title: 6-month HC delay in hearing Anil Deshmukh bail plea irks SC

articles.description: As part of a series of 'Azadi Ka Amrit Mahotsav' (India75) and US-India 75th anniversary celebrations, an event to highlight the cultural heritage of indigenous tribes in Arunachal Pradesh, 'Living Heritage of Arunachal', will be held on Tuesday.
articles.title: Eye on China? US backs event on Arunachal tribes

articles.description: Amid the crisis in Rajasthan, the rebuff from the Gehlot camp stands in stark contrast to the ease with which Congress replaced Amarinder Singh as the chief minister of Punjab last year, underscoring the growing belief that an ever-weakening Congress would leave the leadership vulnerable to state satraps with hold over local units.
articles.title: Why things are falling apart in Congress and centre can't hold

articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi left for Japan on Monday to participate in the state funeral of Shinzo Abe, a leader he shared a great personal rapport with. Modi will meet Abe's wife Akie Abe during his 12-16 hours stay in Japan and also hold bilateral talks with his Japanese counterpart Fumio Kishida.
articles.title: PM Modi to attend Shinzo Abe's funeral in Tokyo today

articles.description: The average GFR in India stood at 86.1 from 2008 to 2010 (three-year period) and has come down to 68.7 during 2018-20 (average of three years), according to the Sample Registration System (SRS) data 2020 released recently. The decline, SRS data show, has been steeper in rural areas at 20.2% compared to 15.6% in urban areas.
articles.title: Fertility rate declined by 20% in India in 10 years: SRS data

articles.description: Minister and Ashok Gehlot loyalist Shanti Dhariwal alleged a “100% conspiracy” against the CM by Ajay Maken and Sachin Pilot. Accusing Maken of approaching MLAs to campaign for Pilot as the next CM, Dhariwal said he had proof to back his allegation.
articles.title: Getting MLAs to switch was Maken's Pilot project: Gehlot loyalist Shanti Dhariwal

articles.description: Former J&K CM Ghulam Nabi Azad launched his Democratic Azad Party with a nod to the "ideals of Mahatma Gandhi" in Jammu on Monday, exactly a month to the day he quit Congress with a critique of how the grand old party he had been part of for five decades "reached the point of no return".
articles.title: Azad unveils party, vows to follow 'Mahatma's ideals'

articles.description: From being the ultimate loyalist and putative national president, Rajasthan chief minister Ashok Gehlot, in the matter of a day, went to being a rebel who defied the leadership. His red line that antagonist Sachin Pilot could not be his replacement triggered a crisis because Congress did not believe that a mild Gandhian who untiringly swears loyalty to the brass could challenge its authority. Stay with TOI for live updates --
articles.title: Live: Pro-Pilot posters in Rajasthan CM hometown

articles.description: Staffers claimed that Pulkit, son of now-expelled BJP leader Vinod Arya, used to “mentally harass the employees” and "frame" anyone trying to quit with "false cases of theft and assault".
articles.title: Arya’s resort was a den of vice: Ex-staffers

articles.description: Europe News: President Vladimir Putin signed a decree on Monday granting Russian citizenship to former US intelligence contractor Edward Snowden.
articles.title: US whistleblower Snowden gets Russian citizenship

articles.description: Pakistan's ousted prime minister Imran Khan on Monday accused senior politician Maryam Nawaz of propagating "sectarianism and religious hatred" against him and hatching a plot to kill him through a "religious fanatic".“Maryam Nawaz along with her accomplices propagated sectarianism and religious hatred against me to make a ground that any religious fanatic gets motivated and kill me,” Khan, 69, said.
articles.title: Maryam hatched plot to kill me, claims Imran Khan

articles.description: Researchers have made the most thorough assessment to date of the global population of ants - insects that have colonized almost everywhere on the planet - and the estimated total is a mind-blowing 20 quadrillion of them, or approximately 2.5 million for every human.
articles.title: How many ants are crawling on Earth? Scientists say 20 quadrillion

articles.description: LML (Lohia Machines Limited) is all set to make a comeback into the Indian market next year as an EV firm, called LML Electric. The new owner of LML, SG Corporate Mobility has announced that it will launch its first electric bike in India in the second half of 2023. Moreover, the company is planning to raise Rs 500 crore funding to set up its manufacturing plant across the country.
articles.title: LML Electric aims to raise Rs 500 crore, India e-bike launch in 2023

articles.description: Instability has come back to haunt the Congress in Rajasthan after two years. The Congress leadership’s move to replace Amarinder Singh with Charanjit Singh Channi in September last year as the Punjab CM a few months before the state poll had cost it dear. Its similar bid to change the chief minister of Rajasthan not just poses a threat to the Ashok Gehlot government but is also likely to harm the party’s prospects in the 2023 assembly election.
articles.title: Congress president election: Is Rajasthan going the Punjab way?

articles.description: Employers are likely to raise staff pay by 10.4% next year, almost on par with the 10.6% so far in 2022, Aon PLC said on Monday. The prospects of a double-digit salary increase comes as India grapples with soaring inflation amid fears of a global economic slowdown.
articles.title: India likely to see double digit pay rises in 2023: Report

articles.description: The ministry of information and broadcasting on Monday blocked 45 YouTube videos from 10 channels for spreading "misinformation, hate speech, and communal hatred." The content included fake news and morphed videos spread with the intent to spread hatred among religious communities.
articles.title: Govt blocks 45 videos on 10 YouTube channels

articles.description: Bigg Boss 16 is all set to premiere on October 1. Many seasons so far have seen love blossoming in the house between popular celebs. While there are some who continue to be together even after the show, there are others who part ways due to irreconcilable differences. Here's taking a look at Bigg Boss couples who broke-up after finding love on the reality show.
articles.title: Bigg Boss couples who broke up after leaving the reality show

articles.description: With the recent news of COVID casualties crossing 20 mark in the last 24 hours, you still need to be equally careful.

articles.description: A 2-1 series win against the reigning World champions of T20 cricket will do Team India a world of good. Now there are three more T20Is to play against the Proteas, once again at home, before the next edition of the T20 World Cup. TimesofIndia.com here takes a quick look at the big positives for Rohit Sharma and co. and some of the big areas of concern that still remain.
articles.title: Ind vs Aus: Big positives & areas of concern for Team India

articles.description: Equity indices dragged for the fourth straight session on Monday with the benchmark BSE sensex crashing over 900 points amid weak global market trends and foreign fund outflows. The 30-share BSE index tanked 953.70 points or 1.64% to settle at 57,145. During the day, it plummeted 1,061 points or 1.82% to 57,038. The NSE Nifty fell 311.05 points or 1.80% to end at 17,016.30.
articles.title: Sensex, Nifty fall for 4th day in a row: Top reasons

articles.description: Since Saturday, when off-spin all-rounder Deepti Sharma ran out England's Charlie Dean in the 44th over at the non-striker's end to get a 16-run victory for India over England at Lord's to complete a 3-0 sweep, the cricketing world has been divided over whether the Indian team should have warned her before effecting the run-out.
articles.title: Had warned Charlie Dean repeatedly: Deepti Sharma

articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: Trouble is brewing in Rajasthan yet again after dozens of Congress MLAs loyal to chief minister Ashok Gehlot raised a banner of revolt late.

articles.description: Close to 8.4 million people are currently living with type 1 diabetes, and this number is expected to rise to 13.5 to 17.4 million by 2040, a new modeling study published in The Lancet Diabetes & Endocrinology has found.

articles.description: India edged Australia by 6 wickets in a thrilling third and final T20I to clinch the series 2-1 on Sunday in Hyderabad. It was a comeback win for the hosts after they lost the opening T20I, where they failed to defend 208. Chasing a tricky 187 in the series decider, India needed 11 runs off the final 6 balls and got across the finish line with a ball to spare.
articles.title: Watch: Kohli & Rohit's ecstatic celebrations after series win

articles.description: India beat Australia by six wickets in the third and final T20 International to clinch the three-match series 2-1. Cameron Green and Tim David scored the bulk of runs as Australia put 186 for 7 after being invited to bat. Chasing the target 187, India won the match after impressive performances by Virat Kohli who scored 63 runs and Suryakumar Yadav who scored 69 runs at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium, Hyderabad. The victory marked India's 21st T20I win in 2022 out of 28 matches. With this, Team India surpassed their arch-rivals Pakistan's record, who had previously held the record of 20 T20I wins in 2021. The victory against Australia also marked Rohit Sharma's 33rd win as India's T20I captain, putting him ahead of Kohli. The Indian team has had four captains in T20s this year with Rohit Sharma, Hardik Pandya, KL Rahul and Rishabh Pant leading the side. Post the win, Rohit shared a few pictures on social media and captioned it as, "CHARACTER 🇮�🇳�." India will next face South Africa in a three-match T20I series, beginning on September 28, 2022.
articles.title: In pics: India wins T20 Int'l series against Aus

His strike rate was also pretty solid at 131.25.

articles.description: Uttarakhand’s sex ratio (number of females per 1,000 males) at birth was found to be the worst in the country at 844, and Kerala’s the best, at 974, according to the Sample Registration System Statistical Report 2020. The report, released by the Registrar General of India (RGI) on September 22, stated that the country’s overall sex ratio at birth had gone up by three points to 907 in 2018-20 from 904 in 2017-19.
articles.title: At 844, sex ratio at birth worst in Uttarakhand

articles.description: An increase of 50 basis points (100bps = 1 percentage point) in interest rates by the monetary policy committee (MPC) of the RBI is seen as inevitable by economists in the wake of the 75bps hike by the US Fed. The subsequent pressure on the rupee has made it more likely that the domestic central bank would increase rates too this Friday.
articles.title: RBI may hike rates by 50bps at this week's policy meet

articles.description: Popular Front of India (PFI) officebearers, many of whom have been in detention, used Abu Dhabi’s Darbar restaurant as the den for all hawala transactions and their illegal transfer to India, ED has said. This is contrary to the claims made by PFI that most of the Rs 120 crore it had received came through petty cash donations in India.
articles.title: PFI used Abu Dhabi restaurant as hub for hawala deals: ED

articles.description: If Gehlot does contest the internal polls, then many believe the message would be that the so-called revolt was actually a "fixed match" between the Central and state brass to demonstrate who among the aspirants had the acceptability to lead the party in Rajasthan. But if Gehlot backs out, then it would be seen as a genuine revolt whereby the state leadership virtually seceded from the already weakened high command, and refused to accept its writ.
articles.title: Real revolt or fixed match? Raj Cong unit keeps all guessing

articles.description: The family of 19-year-old Ankita Bhandari, whose brutal murder rocked Uttarakhand, cremated her body in Srinagar in Pauri Garhwal on Sunday evening. Earlier on Sunday, Ankita’s father refused to cremate her body, demanding the full post-mortem examination report.  ​​The post-mortem examination was conducted on Saturday by a panel of doctors from AIIMS, Rishikesh.
articles.title: Ankita cremated: 'Razing part of resort erased key evidence’

articles.description: Legislators and ministers loyal to Rajasthan CM Ashok Gehlot made a beeline for the assembly speaker’s residence late Sunday to resign en masse ahead of a scheduled CLP meeting, seeking to preempt the possibility of the Congress high command from picking his bete noire Sachin Pilot for chief ministership. Cabinet minister Pratap Singh Khachariyawas said 92 of Congress' 108 MLAs were at speaker CP Joshi’s door.

articles.description: An INLD-organised rally in Haryana’s Fatehabad on Sunday that was meant to be the stage for prominent non-BJP faces to find common ground saw a clutch of opposition parties skip the event, leaving Bihar CM Nitish Kumar, Sharad Pawar and a handful of others to peddle a “mahagathbandhan” as the panacea for the 2024 poll challenge.

articles.description: India can scale up production of the indigenous Tejas light combat aircraft to meet operational requirements and export orders, defence ministry officials said.
